body:
those classic maps were the only goodness left from mczone... dont pretend that you were listening to the players because you just got rid of by far the most popular maps on avicus. Today the throwback rotation was empty for the first time... please bring them ALL back. ALL of them. thanks,,

also so much for nostalgia week...

title: BRING BACK OUR THROWBACK MAPS

No need to create a separate thread about this, you can post this on the Throwback Map Reassessment thread instead.
